translation.en: [Amberley] Time in the alley feels like a lifetime. It's where my ritual begins.
translation.ja: 永遠に感じるスタート直前私の儀式は始まる

translation.en: Think through my run, what it needs to look like, how it needs to feel.
translation.ja: どう走らせ どう見せるかどう感じるかをイメージし―

translation.en: -Get Power and I in sync. -[horse breathes heavily] Connect.
translation.ja: パワーと心を通わせつながる

translation.en: Some riders cut out all the noise in the arena,
translation.ja: 多くの騎手は音を遮断し―

translation.en: hearing only their own breath and the breath of their horse.
translation.ja: 自分と馬の息づかいだけに集中する

translation.en: [announcer over speaker] And now, coming for the national Little Britches finals,
translation.ja: リトル･ブリッチズ大会に登場するのは―

translation.en: this young lady is already standing near the top in the first round in all the categories.
translation.ja: すでに全種目の１回戦でほぼ頂点を極めた若手女性

translation.en: On her way to legend status, Amberley Snyder.
translation.ja: 伝説となる日も近いでしょうアンバリー･スナイダー

translation.en: [Amberley] You gotta blast out of the alley, pick up as much speed as possible before you cross the eye.
translation.ja: まずは飛び出し最高速へとスピードを上げる

translation.en: Standard barrel pattern. Sixty feet to the first barrel. That's the money barrel.
translation.ja: 標準的なコースは第１バレルまで18メートル

translation.en: Ninety feet to the second barrel. Crowd cheers me on.
translation.ja: 第２バレルまで27メートル観客が沸く

translation.en: A hundred and five to the third. Come on! Faster!
translation.ja: 第３バレルまで32メートルもっと速く！

translation.en: Dig in for that last sprint, the run home.
translation.ja: そしてゴールに突き進む

translation.en: You, your horse giving everything. Your legs encouraging his legs.
translation.ja: 脚で蹴って馬に合図し全力を出し切る

translation.en: [Amberley] Faster! Harder! This is it! Cross that eye.
translation.ja: 速く 強く 風のように

translation.en: That time decides who take it, a saddle, a buckle, or a long drive home.
translation.ja: ここまで来たらもう勝負はついた

translation.en: Nothing but failure on your mind.
[announcer] And that run will cinch it. No one can catch her now.
translation.ja: お見事です誰も追いつけません

translation.en: We now have a new Little Britches All-Around Champion, Amberley Snyder.
translation.ja: 本大会の総合優勝はアンバリー･スナイダーです

translation.en: [shouts] Yes, baby! Woo! That's my girl!
translation.ja: やったわ　さすが私の娘ね

translation.en: [announcer] That's a time of 17.5 seconds, just one-tenth off her personal best.
translation.ja: 今回の記録は17.5秒自己ベストまで0.1秒でした

translation.en: One-tenth! I should have pushed him harder.
[Tina] Am, you won! You pulled a check.
Should have been faster on that second barrel.
Mom, I'm not fast enough if I'm gonna go pro.
translation.ja: これじゃプロになれない

translation.en: I know, but can we just enjoy this for a minute, for one minute?
translation.ja: でも少しくらい勝利を喜んだら？

translation.en: Now, go pick up your saddle and congratulate Autumn. Your sister won the all-around too.
translation.ja: 妹を祝福してねオータムも勝ったの

translation.en: -[giggles] -Yeah! Get over here, you little winner!
translation.ja: すごいじゃない！　おいで
いいわ　その調子よ

translation.en: 17.4! These are great times, Am. He is so fast.
translation.ja: 17.4秒よ　パワーは速い馬ね

translation.en: Yeah, we can shave some off of that.
[Tina] Gotta make him pay attention. Tell him where to go. Not my first time.
translation.ja: もっと集中させなきゃいつもこうよ

translation.en: Gotta get him snappier on the backside.
translation.ja: もっと脚を使って後ろを蹴るの
もっと脚を使って後ろを蹴るの 分かった

translation.en: You sure you can leave him?
You two are working so well together.
Mamacita, it's two weeks working retail at the National Western Stock Show. I need that money for my pro permit.
translation.ja: ２週間 バイトで稼いでプロ試験を受けるんだから

translation.en: Hey, you really tightened the pocket on that last barrel.
translation.ja: 最後のバレル よかったよ

translation.en: You can stay on that when you get back.
We have our leadership conference coming up. This is important. Future Farmers of America is...
translation.ja: もうすぐ学生農業クラブ(ＦＦＡ)のスピーチ大会よ

translation.en: Amberley, the world can revolve without you.
-Emmy, this is our ticket to scholarships. -Scholarships.
translation.ja: エミー奨学金がかかってる

translation.en: Speaking of, are you still going?
I mean, do I need to look for a new roommate?
I can rodeo and go to school.
[scoffs] You're hardly home as it is. You missed all your sister's rodeos, every one of your brother's ballgames.
translation.ja: 無理よ　今だって妹弟の応援に行けない

translation.en: why am I watching you, and you don't repay the favor? I pitched a three-hitter last week.
translation.ja: たまには応援に来てよ先週は大活躍した

translation.en: You wouldn't know that, now would you?
Am, please take my truck. This old F-150 can get super squirrely.
translation.ja: 私の車で行って運転しづらいでしょ？

translation.en: What? I love my truck! I've been driving it all over Utah.
translation.ja: いい車よこれでユタを走り回った

translation.en: Well, that doesn't make me like it.
How about if I drive you to Denver, and then I'll take a plane back?
translation.ja: デンバーまで送っていくわ

translation.en: you've had me at this my whole life.
translation.ja: プロになるのが夢なの

translation.en: I could ride a horse before I could walk.
translation.ja: 乗馬は私の人生だもの

translation.en: If we play this right, we have a real shot at Rookie of the Year.
translation.ja: 新人選手賞も夢じゃない

translation.en: I could even make a run at The American.
translation.ja: アメリカン大会も狙える

translation.en: What I know is I can't stop you.

translation.ja: パパ！　ハワイはどう？
パパ！　ハワイはどう？ いいよ

translation.en: Can't go out there and hit the ball for them.
translation.ja: 選手が頑張るしかない

translation.en: Yeah, managing is different than playing, huh?
Riding Power one more time before you go?
You know I've got you in my heart.
And I'll be home next month.
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
Hey, why don't you let me brush Power, and I'll put him away, and then you can hit the road?
translation.ja: パワーの世話はママがやっておく

translation.en: No, we got riding to do.
text me when you stop for gas. Text me when you stop for food.
translation.ja: 給油と食事の時にメールするのよ

translation.en: I want you to call me when you get to the hotel obviously.
translation.ja: 着いたら電話して朝 起きたら…

translation.en: -Call me in the morning when you wake up. -'Cita, chill.
translation.ja: 着いたら電話して朝 起きたら… 落ち着いて

translation.en: I know. It's just my baby girl has grown up, and...
Come on, Power. You and me.
We're on I-80 east of Rawlins.
Look, you gotta get here fast.
I rolled my truck. [Amberley] I got thrown.
translation.ja: 車が回って…　投げ出された

translation.en: Maybe I should try to get up.

translation.ja: ダメだ　動かないで
私のグレーの箱はある？

translation.en: My arm is tired. I need to lean on it.
translation.ja: 腕が疲れた　もたれたい

translation.en: -I'll be right back. -[siren wails in distance]
There's a blue blanket in my front seat.
translation.ja: 座席に青い毛布がある

translation.en: All right, miss, my name is Officer Brad Shervick.
translation.ja: お嬢さん私はシェヴィック巡査

translation.en: You've been in an accident, okay? What city do you live in?
translation.ja: 君は事故に遭った出身は？

translation.en: You got a pretty good cut on your forehead.
I need to call my dad.
Am, it's going to be okay.
Yeah, you need to call Mom and tell her, okay?
translation.ja: ママに連絡しておいて

translation.en: It's okay. You're alive. You're talking to me.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ命があって何よりだよ

translation.en: Miss, I'm gonna need you to put the phone away
translation.ja: 携帯は切ってください

translation.en: and concentrate on me. You can call him back.
Hey, Dad, the paramedics are here, so I gotta go.
[Cory over phone] Let me talk to them.
Sir, your daughter is conscious and alert at the moment.
translation.ja: お父さん 娘さんは意識もあり話もできます

translation.en: That's all I can tell you.
translation.ja: 娘さんは意識もあり話もできます

translation.en: We're going to be taking her to Carbon County Memorial at Rawlins.
translation.ja: ローリンズの郡記念病院に運びます

translation.en: [Bill] I'm gonna stabilize you and pull you forward a little bit, so please just try to remain calm and still.
translation.ja: 固定するので落ち着いて動かずに

translation.en: never been in a hospital. I've never had an IV.
translation.ja: 入院も点滴もしたことない

translation.en: Well, you're about to have a lot of them.
translation.ja: これから経験しますよ

translation.en: I'm gonna pull you forward, okay?
Put your mom on the phone.
-[JC] Dad, what's wrong? -Put your mom on the phone.
translation.ja: なぜ？ ママを出して

translation.en: I'm going to Rawlins. I'm going to the hospital in Rawlins.
Mom, you're not dressed. You don't even have shoes on.
translation.ja: まず着替えよう靴もはいてない

translation.en: I'm gonna go get some clothes.
I'm gonna call Stacey. She's gotta come with me.
I need you to stay and take care of the family, okay?
translation.ja: あなたに家を任せるわ

translation.en: -I'll call Ashley. -I'm gonna go kiss my babies.
Single MVA victim with possible severe spine injury.
translation.ja: 背骨を損傷してるはずだ

translation.en: Patient awake and alert. I need vitals. Get trauma one prepped.
translation.ja: 意識はある　手術の準備を

translation.en: [Cory over phone] They're flying her to Casper Wyoming Med. They have the best doctors there.
translation.ja: キャスパーの病院に転院するそうだ

translation.en: I'll text you when I know more. Thanks.
Thank you, Stacey. Thank you for this.
translation.ja: 助かるわ ステイシー

translation.en: Tina, you're family. Anything you need, I'm here.
translation.ja: 家族同然だものいつでも頼って

translation.en: Am texted me this sunrise this morning.
translation.ja: アンが撮った日の出よ

translation.en: It had to be right before the...
I didn't even respond. I didn't tell her that I loved her.
translation.ja: 私ったら返信もせず愛も伝えなかった
もう大丈夫だがんばってるね

translation.en: I'll be with you on that plane to Casper.
-That can't be... -[Stacey] Oh, Tina! Oh, no!
[Tina] Stacey, pull over. Stacey, pull the car over!

translation.ja: 何これ　なんてこと…
イヤよ　何なのこれ…

translation.en: Hi. I'm looking for Amberley Snyder. I'm her mother.
translation.ja: アンバリー･スナイダーの母です

translation.en: She just got out of surgery. The doctor will update you.
translation.ja: 先ほど手術が終わりました

translation.en: We had to open up her spine and attach two titanium rods in order to stabilize her.
translation.ja: チタン製の棒を埋め込み背骨を支えています

translation.en: Mrs. Snyder, your daughter's T12 vertebrae was crushed, causing severe spinal cord injury.
translation.ja: 第12胸椎の粉砕で重度の脊髄損傷がみられます

translation.en: We pieced together what we could.
[gasps] I don't know what that means.
translation.ja: 脊髄は接合しました どういうこと？

translation.en: It appears that the spinal cord isn't completely severed.
translation.ja: 完全切断ではありません

translation.en: Well, Mrs. Snyder, even with that, she'll be confined to a wheelchair for the rest of her life.
translation.ja: 治ったとしても一生 車イスが必要です

translation.en: [cries] You don't know my Am. You don't know her, so...
translation.ja: でもアンは…先生には分からないわ

translation.en: Mrs. Snyder, the paralysis, it's permanent.
Please can you just stop and take me to her right now?
translation.ja: やめて　もういいわ娘に会せて

translation.en: -Please just take me to my daughter. -Yes, ma'am, right this way.
translation.ja: やめて　もういいわ娘に会せて こちらです

translation.en: If you need anything, we'll be right outside.
translation.ja: 何かあれば外にいます

translation.en: I'm sorry it took me so long to get here.
God, please make my child whole.

translation.ja: お願いよ　娘を助けて

translation.en: and the kids are inside opening presents, and we're missing it.
translation.ja: プレゼントの開封を見逃すわ

translation.en: Cold is not good for horses. They need to be warmed up.
translation.ja: 馬は寒さが苦手だ走らせなきゃ
今朝 乗ったわ そうか

translation.en: He's high-spirited. That's a lot of horse for a little girl.
translation.ja: 威勢がいい馬ね少女には不向きよ
“パワー”　あなたの名前よ
ごめんなさい 大丈夫よ　心配しないで
大丈夫よ　心配しないで

translation.en: I got you. I got you, baby.

translation.ja: ごめん 言わないで

translation.en: I got you. Look at you. You're up.
translation.ja: もう大丈夫　ママがいるわ

translation.en: I'm so happy to see you.
Daddy is coming. Everybody is so, so excited to see you.
translation.ja: パパもみんなも会いたがってる

translation.en: [cries] Honey, I'm sorry. You're paralyzed, baby.
translation.ja: 残念だけど…　もう動かない

translation.en: It's gonna be okay. I promise.

translation.ja: お願い 泣かないで

translation.en: We both have to keep it together when we're in there, but...
translation.ja: 本人の前では強くいたい

translation.en: I don't know. It's so hard.
I got a call from the insurance company.
They said now that Am is through with her operations...
That's great. Now, she can go into rehab.
Except... she can only be transported by air.
translation.ja: でも飛行機での移動になる

translation.en: They won't pay to fly her back to Provo.
It's 25 grand, and I'm not playing for the Dodgers.
We can't do it here. It's six weeks. Rehab is six weeks. She has to be by her family.
translation.ja: ここじゃできない６週間のリハビリは必要よ

translation.en: I'm not really in the mood, Mom.
That they don't know who or what they're dealing with.
translation.ja: 俺が何者か知らないってさ

translation.en: I'm full of steel. You're not going to hurt me.
translation.ja: 金属まみれだから大丈夫

translation.en: She's got a drive like I never had.
Looks like that girls is not stopping till she gets to the NFR.
translation.ja: 全米ロデオ大会(ＮＦＲ)も狙えそうね

translation.en: National Finals? She's got college in the fall.
translation.ja: 秋には大学に行くのよ

translation.en: [clicks tongue] We start Saturday morning. Be here at 7:00 a.m.
translation.ja: 土曜の朝７時に来なさい

translation.en: Everybody is here to see you.
Mom, I can't. I'm too tired.
translation.ja: 無理よ　疲れてるの

translation.en: Please just get me out of here.
-Cory, who are all these people? -[crowd cheer]
[Cory] They're all here to support our girl.
And guess what. MLB Players' Assistance Team, they donated to pay for the flight.
translation.ja: プロ野球の支援チームが寄付してくれた

translation.en: Yeah, they helped with this also.
she can't handle that right now. I gotta get her to the hospital.
translation.ja: 今は病院に行かなきゃ

translation.en: I'll take care of it, kid.
You're a good man, Cory Snyder.
Oh, no, sweet pea, we must rotate our body every two hours,
translation.ja: それはダメ ２時間ごとに体位を変えるの

translation.en: or we will get pressure sores, and we don't want that.
translation.ja: 床ずれにならないようにね

translation.en: [Amberley] We? Somebody needs to roll you too?
translation.ja: あなたも回されてみたら？

translation.en: Why don't you show me how to do that?
Now, no, what would you have me do if I showed you how to do my job?
translation.ja: やり方を教えたら私の仕事がなくなる

translation.en: Well, I'm here 24/7. I can haul 100 bales of hay.
translation.ja: ここにいるのは私だもの

translation.en: Mom, you gotta go work the horses.
Well, you don't need to stay here.

translation.ja: ダメ　ここにいるわ

translation.en: Face it. You're stuck with me.
translation.ja: 諦めて　離れないから

translation.en: Learn to love that chair. That is your freedom.
translation.ja: このイスが自由をくれる

translation.en: I'll check in on you later. We are going to get ourselves right out of your hair.
translation.ja: 私が戻ったら乗る練習をしましょう

translation.en: Blessings abound, my child. Sometimes a little tough to see.
translation.ja: 時に祝福は見えづらいものよ

translation.en: Come on, Am. Let's go! Dig!
translation.ja: いいぞ アンそうだ　行け！
行け 行け 行け！

translation.en: That puts Amberley Snyder in second place. Give her a round of applause.
translation.ja: アンバリーは２位です皆さん拍手を！

translation.en: You got some work to do.
We should have beaten that time. Power really fought me.
You want to be the best, second place won't cut it.
translation.ja: 頂点に立つなら２位はいらない

translation.en: we want to build up our strength and our balance.
translation.ja: 筋力とバランスを強化する

translation.en: Go ahead and lock your wheels for me.
And you can go ahead and lift your legs out of your leg rests.
Now, some tools that really help us to speed along our work:
translation.ja: リハビリに必要なことは

translation.en: So, let's start with the easy ones. What are things you see yourself doing?

translation.ja: 歩く 乗る ロデオよ

translation.en: My daughter, not one to hold back.
translation.ja: 娘は前しか向かないの
ああ　やる気がある

translation.en: So, what we wanna do is we wanna get into a standing position.
translation.ja: 今日は立つ姿勢になるよ

translation.en: So, go ahead and grab a bar with each arm, okay?
You're gonna use that upper body strength to pull yourself up.
Now, this first time, I'm gonna be doing the majority of the work, all right? I've got you.
translation.ja: 最初は僕が手伝うから安心して

translation.en: So, on the count of three, we're gonna rock,
and we're gonna get you up.
Mom, Diego is touching my butt.
translation.ja: ママ　ディエゴがお尻を

translation.en: Nope, these are your hips. I'm at your hips.
translation.ja: いいや　ここは腰だよ

translation.en: Diego, it looks like you're touching my daughter's butt.
translation.ja: お尻を触ってるみたい

translation.en: Ma'am, this is part of what we have...
I see how it is here. You two are funny.
translation.ja: そういうことか　面白い

translation.en: All right, I'm putting you down, all right? Come on.
you're gonna do the majority of the work.
You might not get standing all the way up, and that's okay.
translation.ja: 完全に立てなくていい

translation.en: We just want to build up that upper body strength, okay?
translation.ja: 上半身を鍛えるだけだ

translation.en: All right, same thing. We're gonna go on the count of three.
translation.ja: では また３つ数えるよ

translation.en: Give it all you got. Ready?
Yep, try to stand. Come on.

translation.ja: そうだ　力を入れて

translation.en: Hey. We're gonna make a little progress every day, yeah?
translation.ja: いい？　毎日 少しずつできるようになる

translation.en: We're gonna do this together, okay? You gotta wait for me. Come on.
translation.ja: 今度は一緒にやろう焦らずに

translation.en: There you go. You go this. Keep going. Come on.
translation.ja: がんばれ　その調子だ
そうだ　力を入れて

translation.en: No, she's doing really good. Do you wanna stop?
Your dad is getting everything ready at the house.
translation.ja: パパが家をリフォームしてる

translation.en: He's even putting in a custom elevator in the pantry.
translation.ja: パントリーにエレベーターも付けたわ

translation.en: And Autumn is so excited to see you. Everyone is.
translation.ja: オータムも会いたがってる

translation.en: Oh, and before I forget, this kid, Tate Watkins, keeps emailing.
translation.ja: テイトって人が何通もメールをくれるの

translation.en: You had that FFA speech scheduled for the end of next month.
translation.ja: ＦＦＡのスピーチの件だって

translation.en: You have to cancel it. I can't.
No, yeah. I mean, that's what I told him. But this kid is funny. He really wants you there.
translation.ja: そう言ってるけどあなたに出てほしいみたい

translation.en: He said he's going to be re-schedule it for when you get better.
Oh! When am I gonna get better?
translation.ja: あら　治るっていつ？

translation.en: I'm not going in this thing.
Dad is picking up Taylor and Aubrey.
Yeah, they'll be here in, like, 15 minutes.

translation.ja: 誰がパワーに乗ってる？

translation.en: I got right back on him.
[Diego] Okay, it's all in the technique.
translation.ja: すべてはテクニックだ

translation.en: You want to grab on the push rim as far back as you can without overextending your shoulders.
translation.ja: ハンドリムを握って肩は真っすぐ

translation.en: When you're first starting out, you can cheat a little bit
translation.ja: 最初はタイヤを握ってもいい
最初はタイヤを握ってもいい いいから 見せて

translation.en: Really? You think you can do better?

translation.ja: アン　アン　アン…

translation.en: Am! Am! Am! You got it! You got this.
translation.ja: アン　アン　アン いい調子　行けるよ

translation.en: -I can do it. -I got you. It's okay. Let go.
translation.ja: できる！ 力を抜いて
大丈夫　練習しよう

translation.en: Look, it's not just about your arms. It's about your balance too.
translation.ja: 大切なのは筋力とバランスだ

translation.en: You've been using your legs to balance your entire life.
Now, as you start to do more stuff for yourself, you're gonna find things that once came naturally are now difficult,
translation.ja: 今まで簡単だったことが難しく感じて当然だ

translation.en: and that's okay. That's what we're gonna work through.
[sighs] Diego tells me you canceled therapy.
translation.ja: リハビリをサボったの？

translation.en: Mom, I'm spending my 19th birthday here...
translation.ja: 19歳の誕生日をこんな場所で過ごしてる

translation.en: I'm stuck in that chair for the rest of my life.
translation.ja: 私は残りの人生車イスに縛られるの？

translation.en: Okay, I know. I get it.
I am so sick of you feeling sorry for yourself.
translation.ja: 自分を哀れんでばかりね

translation.en: How long did it take you and Power to put together a good barrel run?
translation.ja: パワーと走るまでどれだけ練習した？

translation.en: Now, get in. You're going to therapy.
translation.ja: 乗りなさい　リハビリよ

translation.en: [Cory] Diego said you were having balance issues.
translation.ja: バランスが取れないんだってな

translation.en: Remember where your balance was best?
We both know that you were best in the saddle. It's where you learned balance.
translation.ja: お前はサドルの上でバランスを学んだ

translation.en: Am, if it's not to ride again, so be it.
But it won't be because you didn't try.
Use your upper body position to find your balance.
Trust your instincts. You got this.
translation.ja: 直感を信じろお前なら大丈夫だ

translation.en: I'm gonna let you go. Find your balance.
translation.ja: 放すよ　バランスだ

translation.en: When I come back, you better have those shoes on.
[Felice] You better be glad that missed.

translation.ja: あれ タック･モーガン？

translation.en: You know, that boy is trying my last damn nerve.
translation.ja: あの子には手を焼いてるわ

translation.en: Mmm. I heard about him. He's a bull rider.
translation.ja: あの人 ブルライダーよ

translation.en: [chuckles] Oui! A very angry bull rider.
translation.ja: なるほどね本人も怒った牛みたい

translation.en: The child won't start therapy. He refuses to talk to anyone.
translation.ja: リハビリも拒否して誰とも話さない
アンバリーよ 調子はどう？
私も そう言ってた

translation.en: But I know it's not fine.
And I know it's not good. I mean...
all they wanted to hear was that I was fine.
translation.ja: みんな同じ答えを聞きたがる

translation.en: inside, I knew how bad it was.
pretty bleak. No one could understand that.
translation.ja: 絶望よでも誰も分かってない

translation.en: I used to feel that way.
translation.ja: 私も そう思ってた

translation.en: I can't do anything for myself anymore. That's just not me.
translation.ja: 自力で何もできないなんて私じゃない

translation.en: [Amberley] I used to throw a saddle on my horse and ride all day.
translation.ja: こうなる前は一日中サドルにまたがってた

translation.en: Got better for me when I started therapy

translation.ja: やらない 強制じゃない

translation.en: But it might help. Really helped me.
translation.ja: でも役に立った　私にはね

translation.en: You're still never gonna walk again.
I am gonna get on a horse again.
Eight seconds on a bull, but...
Everybody got their money for the lotto? We are going to win this time.
translation.ja: 宝くじは買った？絶対 当てるわよ

translation.en: Wow, well... you've been a handful.
translation.ja: あなたには手を焼いたわ

translation.en: [laughs] Honey, this is what I've been blessed with.
translation.ja: 私は ここで幸せよ

translation.en: Now, you go on home and get your glory.
translation.ja: あなたは帰って栄光を手に入れて

translation.en: [Tina] Felice, thank you. We never could have done this without you.
translation.ja: フェリス　ありがとう あなたのおかげ

translation.en: And remember that going up is your biggest threat, okay?
translation.ja: 上り坂が一番 怖いリムを握って…

translation.en: -Get that momentum. Pop a wheelie-- -I know.
translation.ja: 上り坂が一番 怖いリムを握って… 分かってるよ
あなたは すばらしい人よ

translation.en: no matter what life gives you...
[Diego] So, why don't we talk about the things that you see yourself doing?
'Cause if we have a goal, you keep picturing it in your mind, you can stay focused on it.
translation.ja: 目標を頭に描き続ければ集中できる

translation.en: [Amberley] Mom, I don't think I'm ready for this.
translation.ja: ママ　やっぱり自信ないよ

translation.en: Just your dad. Ashley took everyone to dinner.
translation.ja: パパだけよ　みんなは外食

translation.en: -[Tina] Hey, you wanna get that chair? -Sure.
I'm headed out. I've gotta go pick up Aubrey from dance.
translation.ja: オーブリーを迎えに行ってくる

translation.en: I wish I could saddle you up and just go for a ride, you and me.
translation.ja: あなたに乗って走れたらうれしいんだけど…

translation.en: [voicemail] Hey, there. It's Tina Snyder. Go on and leave a message, and you have a blessed day.
translation.ja: はい ティナですメッセージをどうぞ

translation.en: Hey, Mom, just curious when you're coming home.
translation.ja: ママ いつ戻るのかなと思って連絡して
いつ戻るのかなと思って連絡して

translation.en: Look at that. My plan worked. Leaving the horses out.
translation.ja: 馬を出しておいて正解ね

translation.en: I was stuck. You couldn't tell?
I was so happy to see you with those horses.
translation.ja: 馬に会いに行ったのかと…
馬に会いに行ったのかと… いいから もう―
いいから もう― 放っといて

translation.en: I'm your Mamacita, and I'm not going anywhere.
translation.ja: 私は母親よあなたから離れない

translation.en: And I'm going to be here for both of us until you can be there for yourself.
translation.ja: 自分を取り戻すまでそばにいるわ

translation.en: If I have to strap you in that saddle myself.
translation.ja: サドルに縛りつけてでもね

translation.en: Are you seriously asking me that?
-[Emmy] Yeah, Am! -[Ashley] You got this, Am!
What's wrong? Don't you wanna go in the arena?
Hey, you'll have to give this a chance.
It's never gonna be the same.
I could tell the second I got up here.
There's nothing I can do about it.
All right, that's gonna be enough for today.
[Autumn] No, I wanna see you ride more.
[Emmy] You know that was just the first time out, right?
I still see the same girl I knew before the accident.
translation.ja: 事故の前と何も変わらない

translation.en: The Amberley I know wouldn't be beaten until she'd done absolutely everything she could first.
translation.ja: アンバリーはそんな簡単には負けない人よ
エミーには分からない

translation.en: [Autumn] She's hardly been down here with the horses.
Autumn, you gotta give her some time.
Until then, these horses aren't gonna clean up after themselves.
translation.ja: それまで馬の世話をお願い

translation.en: Go on. Go get the wheelbarrow.
[Amberley] Why won't you leave me alone?

translation.ja: テイト おはようアンバリーよ
いいや　起きてたよ

translation.en: Yeah, you need to stop emailing me.
I don't know you, and you need to stop reminding me of stuff I can't do.
translation.ja: できないことを何度も知らされたくない

translation.en: Slow down. Let's talk. You know, I rodeo too.
translation.ja: 少し話そう僕もロデオをやるんだ

translation.en: Sitting third in the standings for our circuit.
Before, every time on a horse,
translation.ja: 以前は― 馬に乗ってる時が一番 自然でいられた

translation.en: it felt like the most natural thing in the world.
translation.ja: 馬に乗ってる時が一番 自然でいられた

translation.en: I can't do the one thing that I love to do.
translation.ja: たった１つの好きな事ができなくなった

translation.en: Maybe you could do something other than rodeo.

translation.ja: ロデオはするんじゃない

translation.en: Really, it's who I am. It's like...
I just gotta find a way to wrap my mind around this new reality.
translation.ja: ただ私が現実と向き合えばいいだけ
よかったら また話そう

translation.en: [Cory] Am, I'm home! Come on outside.
translation.ja: 帰ったぞ　外においで

translation.en: Doctor said you should be ready to start driving.
translation.ja: 医者は運転を勧めてる

translation.en: It's set up with hand controls and everything.
What? Mom, I can handle this.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ　運転できる

translation.en: Let me show you how it works.

translation.ja: アクセルとブレーキね

translation.en: Are you sure you don't want us to go with you?
♪ Odds are, you don't beat the odds ♪ ♪ But they don't know the thing we've got... ♪
[Amberley] It's all about keeping my balance.
A seatbelt on a saddle. That is a new one on me.
translation.ja: サドルにシートベルトとは斬新ね

translation.en: Well, I figure you can attach it behind the cantle.
translation.ja: 鞍尾(あんび)の後ろ側につけたいの

translation.en: You think you can do that?
A seatbelt, it's what put me in this chair. It might be what gets me out.
translation.ja: シートベルトよ縛るものなのに自由になれる

translation.en: I know it's new now, but...
Ready to be my legs, bubba?
Sweetest bale of hay I ever tossed.
Let's take it easy. I'm still not sold on this seat belt.
translation.ja: ベルトは過信できない

translation.en: [Tina] You're gonna have to make him work without leg cues.
translation.ja: 蹴らずに指示を出すの

translation.en: [Amberley] We'll get there. I get this down, and I can start training again.
translation.ja: それができたらまた訓練できる

translation.en: I was talking to Stacey, and we had this idea.
translation.ja: ステイシーと話してたの

translation.en: To get me ready to run?
Hey, Am, you have the gift. You've had it since before you could even walk, but...
translation.ja: あなたは― 才能もあるし歩く前から乗ってたけど…
けど？　今も乗れるよ

translation.en: Yes, but you could also coach.
translation.ja: でもコーチにもなれる

translation.en: Stacey says that she needs you. You could help her with the kids.
translation.ja: ステイシーの助手としてオータムを教えて

translation.en: -Autumn is working with her now. -Oh, good for her!
translation.ja: ステイシーの助手としてオータムを教えて オータムを？私はコーチじゃない
オータムを？私はコーチじゃない

translation.en: Yeah, but it might be a good way to just get you--
Stacey needs you. Autumn needs you. You could take those riders to a new level.
translation.ja: ステイシーもオータムもあなたが必要なの

translation.en: What? You're telling me that God wants me like this?
translation.ja: 神様の意思でこうなったと？

translation.en: No, honey, I think he wants what's best for you.
translation.ja: 最善の道を探すべきよ

translation.en: Well, then why did he give me this talent and then yank it away?
translation.ja: なぜ神様は与えた才能を奪うの？

translation.en: And why did he give me a mother that doesn't believe in me
translation.ja: なぜママは私を信じないの？

translation.en: and treats me like a cripple?
Wait. That's not what I meant.
[Tina] Am, I'm sorry. That coaching idea was wrong. I shouldn't have said--
translation.ja: ごめんなさいコーチの話は忘れて

translation.en: Hey, it's just gonna take some time.
If I can't ride like I used to, I never wanna ride again.
translation.ja: でも昔のようには乗れない

translation.en: It kills me that I can't fix this.
translation.ja: 私が治せるなら治したい

translation.en: I should have died in that crash.
[shouts] Hey, don't you say that! Don't you dare say that!
translation.ja: それは言わないで絶対によ！

translation.en: I thank God every day that you are here.
translation.ja: あなたの命に感謝してる

translation.en: And I know that everything is different.
But we're just gonna have to find a new way to live with this.
translation.ja: 新しい生き方を見つけるしかない

translation.en: This chair will either be your wings, or it will be your anchor. You decide.
translation.ja: このイスが 翼か足かせか決めるのは あなたよ

translation.en: heading to Utah South, agricultural education."
translation.ja: “南ユタ大学の農学部を希望します”

translation.en: You gonna say it like that?
[chuckles] I haven't done this a lot.
I put in all the rodeo stuff, like winning Little Britches.
Yeah. Two saddles, finals, and world.
translation.ja: 世界大会の決勝進出も？

translation.en: Listen, if I suck up there, you can boo me off the stage.
translation.ja: しくじったらブーイングして

translation.en: Oh, my God! I didn't think! I swear!
translation.ja: ごめん　考えてなかった

translation.en: There are some goals that may be out of my grasp for now.
translation.ja: 今は達成できない目標もあります

translation.en: Dreams that are just... too big.
translation.ja: 例えば大きすぎる夢です

translation.en: I'm working on new goals, new dreams.
translation.ja: 新しい目標と夢を探しています

translation.en: [Amberley] I start Utah South in two weeks.
translation.ja: ２週間後南ユタ大学に入学します

translation.en: I've learned we don't always get to choose what happens to us,
translation.ja: 人生で起きることは選べませんが―

translation.en: but we do get to choose what we do next.
translation.ja: 何をするかは選べます

translation.en: Most importantly, we never give up.
translation.ja: 諦めないことが何より大切です
人生が どんな逆境でも

translation.en: I think I might just sit in on chemistry to see if I wanna...
translation.ja: 化学を取ってみるよもしかしたら…

translation.en: I don't think we're there yet.
[over phone] Amberley, Jenna Walters from American Morning.
translation.ja: ジェンナ･ウォルターよ
ジェンナ･ウォルターよ

translation.en: [Jenna] Listen, we'd like to do a profile piece on you.
translation.ja: あなたを取材したいの

translation.en: People really want to hear your story, and somebody told me you were back on your horse again.
translation.ja: 視聴者も喜ぶし乗馬を再開したと聞いたわ

translation.en: So we thought it would be very inspiring to people facing difficult situations.
translation.ja: 困難な状況にいる人に勇気を与えられる

translation.en: Yeah, I can ride him around a little.
translation.ja: ええ　少しなら乗れるわ

translation.en: I can be down there with my crew on Saturday.
You haven't been on your horse in two months.
And the last time you were, you said you were never getting on your horse again.
translation.ja: この前“二度と乗らない”って

translation.en: I mean, are you up for this?

translation.ja: でも もう後には引けない

translation.en: The doctors asked me what my goals were. I knew right away:
translation.ja: 目標を聞かれてすぐに答えました
“歩く 乗る ロデオ”と

translation.en: [Jenna] Is there a future in rodeo?
Really, I'm the only one who can decide what I'm capable of.
translation.ja: 私にできることは私にしか分かりません

translation.en: I've got a lot of work to do.
whatever life gives you, you've got three choices.
translation.ja: 逆境の人生で選べる道は３つ

translation.en: You can either give up, give in, or give it your all.
translation.ja: 諦める 負ける 全力を尽くす

translation.en: And I figured it was time that I gave it my all.
translation.ja: 私は全力を尽くしたいと思います

translation.en: It's an incredible story. We'll be watching for you.
translation.ja: すばらしい話が聞けたわ

translation.en: -That's it. I think we've got it. -Cool.
Let's just get some B-roll of her riding, okay?
translation.ja: 乗馬の映像を撮らせて

translation.en: [chuckles] I know. It's crazy. Jenna Walters is just sitting in our barn.
translation.ja: 驚いた？あのジェンナが家にいる

translation.en: Well, they're about to finish up, and she's gonna get on Power, and I'm freaking out a little bit, so...
translation.ja: あとはパワーに乗った映像を撮って終わり

translation.en: Yes, Cory, I promise. I won't forget to breathe.
translation.ja: 平気よ コーリー私は落ち着いてる

translation.en: -[Emmy] Amberley, you got this! -[Tina] There you go.
I can't tell you what to do with my legs anymore. Listen to my voice.
translation.ja: 脚は動かないから私の声を聞いて

translation.en: Hey, you don't wanna miss this.
[Ashley] You got it, Am. Keep going.
Mom, he's behaving like a prince.
translation.ja: ママ！　パワーが優しいの

translation.en: [announcer over speaker] Give it up for number 17, Jenny Watkins.
translation.ja: 次の出場者は17番 ジニー･ワトキンズ

translation.en: -Do you think Amberley will win? -Heck, yeah!
translation.ja: アンは勝てる？ もちろん
テイト･ワトキンズです

translation.en: What if she falls? She gets hurt?
Hey, I'm going nuts as it is.
translation.ja: 余計なこと言わないで

translation.en: Sorry. Somebody had to say it.
Am is just here for practice, see what she can do.
translation.ja: 今日は練習で出るだけだ

translation.en: Yeah, well, she's gonna do great.

translation.ja: 努力してる そうね

translation.en: You ask me, I say you haven't the sense God gave you!
translation.ja: あんた 常識ないね

translation.en: Letting your handicapped child on a horse.
translation.ja: 障がい者の子供に乗馬？

translation.en: [woman] So reckless! What kind of a mother are you?
translation.ja: 信じられない　どんな母親？

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna show you what kind of a mother I am.
translation.ja: どんな母親か教えてあげるわ

translation.en: -That is none of your-- -Hey, it's all right.
[announcer] Up next, we have a real comeback kid.
translation.ja: 奇跡の復活劇を遂げました

translation.en: Just months after her accident... I still can't believe this.
translation.ja: 事故から数カ月で復帰とは信じられません

translation.en: ...ready to take her first run, Amberley Snyder on Power.
translation.ja: 今回が最初の復帰戦アンバリーとパワーです

translation.en: they said you and I would never be back here.
translation.ja: みんな戻れないと思ってた

translation.en: [announcer] 17.6 seconds. Good enough for second place.
translation.ja: 記録は17.6秒で２位につけました

translation.en: What a ride, folks! What a ride!
Amberley Snyder, give it up for her one more time.
translation.ja: アンバリー･スナイダーに盛大な拍手を！

translation.en: It feels like... I don't know.
translation.ja: この感じ…　何かしら

translation.en: Ashley took them all out for pizza.
translation.ja: みんなピザ店に行った

translation.en: Should be back in an hour or so.
I'm sorry. I should be happy, and I am. I just...
translation.ja: ごめんなさい喜ぶべきよね

translation.en: She's alive, and she's here, and she's back on the horse.
translation.ja: アンは生きてるしまた馬に乗ってる

translation.en: [cries] But then I see her in that chair.
I can't... I just can't do anything.
translation.ja: 何もしてあげられない

translation.en: I can't fix her. I can't protect her.
translation.ja: 治せないし 守れない

translation.en: Every time I look at her, it hits me.
translation.ja: アンを見るたびにそう思うの

translation.en: [cries] I told her not to take that truck. You know, I stood there with her.
translation.ja: あの車はやめてとそばで言ったのよ

translation.en: -And I let her go. -It's not your fault.
translation.ja: でも行かせた 違うよ君のせいじゃない

translation.en: There's so many things she's never gonna be able to do, you know?
translation.ja: 二度とできないことばかり

translation.en: She's never gonna be able to walk down the aisle.
She's never gonna be able to run with her kids.
I say sky is the limit.
[Amberley] Mom, you know I can make a faster run.
translation.ja: もっと速く走らせたい

translation.en: [Tina] I know, baby, but let's take it one rodeo at a time.
translation.ja: 分かってるでも少しずつね
もう少しで戻れそうよ

translation.en: Got word from Andrea Busby at Busby Quarter Horses.
translation.ja: アンドレア･バズビーから連絡があった

translation.en: They want to put you up for the Fan Favorite Exemption at The American this year.
translation.ja: アメリカン大会のファン特別枠に出てほしいと

translation.en: but they've been following your story,
translation.ja: 長い道のりだけど あなたの復帰に協力したいそうよ

translation.en: and they want to get it started for you.
translation.ja: あなたの復帰に協力したいそうよ

translation.en: Power, do you hear that? The American!
translation.ja: パワー 聞いた？アメリカン大会よ

translation.en: Power is ready. Not sure about you.
[Tina] The American is as big as it gets.
translation.ja: 観客も すごく多いのよ

translation.en: I guess we got work to do.
Less than a year after her truck accident,
Amberley Snyder is back with a time of 17.7 seconds.
translation.ja: アンドレア･スナイダーは17.7秒を たたき出しました
才能を見せつけています

translation.en: She is up for the Fan Favorite Exemption at The American, and she is showing us why.
translation.ja: アメリカン大会のファン特別枠にふさわしい―

translation.en: That's a first-place finish for Amberley Snyder.
translation.ja: 本大会１位を獲得しました
アンバリーの記録は17.42秒です

translation.en: Look at this girl run. The American should make some room. Unbelievable.
translation.ja: アメリカン大会も驚く彼女の走りを ご覧ください

translation.en: [announcer 3] Give this little lady a round of applause.
translation.ja: アンバリーに盛大な拍手を！

translation.en: [announcer 4] And she's coming around the second barrel.

translation.ja: バレルが転倒しました

translation.en: That's gonna cost her a five-second penalty. A time of 22.7 seconds.
translation.ja: ５秒のペナルティーがつき記録は22.7秒です

translation.en: Putting Amberley Snyder outside of our top five riders.
translation.ja: アンバリーは上位５名から外れます

translation.en: Well, you're gonna have to get him ready for regionals in Pocatello soon.
translation.ja: 地区大会に向けて調整しよう

translation.en: We gotta get faster if I'm gonna go The American.
translation.ja: もっと速く走らなきゃ

translation.en: I must have just sat in something.
That's the last one unless you wanna ride the donkey.
[Tina] I do not know what is going on with you.
I don't know what kind of bug you got, but it's making you all wonky.
I'm gonna go inside, and I'm gonna make you a protein smoothie.
translation.ja: プロテインスムージーを作ってくる

translation.en: You need to start taking better care of yourself. You know that?
All right, give me your weight.
Those horses are getting hungry. Come on. Let's go.
I'll meet you inside, all right?
Hey, Mom, I don't feel very--
-[JC] Mom, what can I do? -[Tina] JC, go get the keys.
translation.ja: ジェイシー　車のカギよ

translation.en: Autumn, open the door! Open the back door!
translation.ja: オータム　ドアを開けて

translation.en: You've got a softball-sized ulcer that goes right down to the bone.
translation.ja: 傷口が潰瘍化して骨に達しています
とても重い症状です死の危険もある

translation.en: I'll tell you, if you had waited two more days, you could have died.
translation.ja: ２日遅かったら命はなかったでしょう

translation.en: My kid is dying right in front of me. I don't even see it?
[doctor] We've got her on IV antibiotics now,
translation.ja: 抗生剤の点滴だけでなく

translation.en: but we need to operate right away.
No, I've got two rodeos this weekend and a shot at The American.
translation.ja: アメリカンをかけた大会が週末に２つある

translation.en: This infection will kill you if we don't treat it now.
translation.ja: すぐに治療しなければ命はない

translation.en: You'll need intensive wound care and be on long-term antibiotics.
translation.ja: 傷のケアと長期の抗生剤治療が必要です

translation.en: What? No, then I'm not doing it. I'm not doing it.
translation.ja: それなら治療はしない

translation.en: Can I talk to my daughter alone, please?
Let me know now, and I'll get ready to bury my child,
translation.ja: そうなら葬儀の準備をするわ

translation.en: I can't go through this again. I won't.
translation.ja: 私も耐えられそうにない

translation.en: So if you wanna kill yourself, you're gonna put me in that box right next to you.
translation.ja: 死にたいなら私も殺す覚悟で死んで

translation.en: Why the hell did you not tell me?
Am, you just have to know your limits.
No! It's all gonna go away!
Everything changed in that one moment.
translation.ja: あの瞬間にすべてが変わったわ

translation.en: But then, I was me again. I was riding.
translation.ja: でも… 自分を取り戻せた

translation.en: that if you knew, it would all go away.
translation.ja: またすべて手放すことになるって
ごめんなさい 怖かっただけなの

translation.en: One turkey sandwich, cheddar cheese and no crust.
translation.ja: ターキーサンドイッチチーズのせ パン耳なし
ありがとう どうぞ

translation.en: That's a ridiculous amount of fan mail.
translation.ja: ファンレターだらけだ

translation.en: "I'm ten and live in San Antonio, Texas.
translation.ja: “私はテキサスに住む10歳です”

translation.en: I got hit by a car and am in a wheelchair just like you.
translation.ja: “車にひかれて歩けなくなりました”

translation.en: I used to feel like giving up, but I see what you do,
translation.ja: “諦めていたけど―” “あなたを見てまた挑戦したくなりました”

translation.en: and it makes me want to try harder.
translation.ja: “あなたを見てまた挑戦したくなりました”

translation.en: I can do great things too. Your fan, Brittany Carlson."
translation.ja: “あなたを見てまた挑戦したくなりました” “あなたのファンより”

translation.en: What do you want me to write back?
[Ashley] Am, there are tons of more messages like that.
translation.ja: 他にも大勢から届いてる

translation.en: [Aubrey] Am, maybe you could help them.
Bubba, we're going to The American.
translation.ja: ババ　アメリカン大会よ

translation.en: Come on. Let's go this way.
[Amberley] Mom, I should drive with you.
No, it's better you fly in tomorrow. My nerves are working enough.
translation.ja: 明日の飛行機で来て心配だから

translation.en: I'll make sure she gets to the airport.
Glad you got Legacy in there. Power travels better with company.
translation.ja: レガシーと一緒ならパワーも喜ぶ

translation.en: You haven't had enough time to get ready. You've only run those barrels at competition-level three times.
translation.ja: 大会に３回 出ただけじゃ練習が足りない

translation.en: Mom, we've been over this. I feel great.
translation.ja: ママ　私は絶好調よ

translation.en: Tina, we'll get her through a couple of runs before she leaves.
translation.ja: 出発前に何度か走らせる

translation.en: And we'll train hard when we get to Texas. We'll have three days.
translation.ja: テキサスでも３日あるわ

translation.en: It's turning into snow. I think I might have to stop for the night.
translation.ja: 雪になったら朝まで待たなきゃ

translation.en: I'm sorry, honey. I know you need time to train.
translation.ja: 練習できなくて残念ね
いいの　気を付けて

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow night.Love you.
translation.ja: 明日の夜ね　大好きよ

translation.en: This has to let up. I only have one more day.
translation.ja: 大会は あさってなのに
もし今回 失敗したら…

translation.en: at The American, in front of thousands of people,
translation.ja: 大勢の観客に見られたら―

translation.en: that's gonna stick with me forever.
You know that I can't quit.
translation.ja: でも私はやめられない

translation.en: I remember the first time I saw you riding. I mean, really riding.
translation.ja: あなたが初めて風のように走った時のこと

translation.en: You were maybe ten years old.
I was watching you, and I got jealous.
Oh. Such a natural gift, even then.
And now... the fact that you're even here after that accident...
translation.ja: でも今だってあんな事故の後なのに

translation.en: Honey, look how far you've taken yourself.
translation.ja: あなたは― こんな所まで来たのよ

translation.en: If I decide to go for it,
translation.ja: 前に進むって決めたの

translation.en: Well, then, I'm gonna be there for you.
What are you doing here? I thought you had to work.
I do. My buddy, Justin, he's in the team roping competition. I'm just helping out with his horses.
translation.ja: 友達が出場するからその手伝いに来た

translation.en: Are you crazy? I wouldn't miss this for nothing.
translation.ja: まさか　君を見に来た

translation.en: [Tina] I gotta get you off there so Casey and Ryan can do final checks.
translation.ja: パワーを最終確認に行かせて

translation.en: Of course. Let me help you.
You can put me down now.
I could do that all day.

translation.ja: テイト　ありがとう

translation.en: You're the first person that has made me feel like I'm not in this chair.
translation.ja: あなたのおかげでイスから自由になれた

translation.en: -All right, I guess I should put you down. -[laughs]
[announcer] Welcome to the RFD-TV's The American,
translation.ja: アメリカン大会が開幕します
世界一のロデオ大会です
世界中から集まった強者たちが―

translation.en: the toughest competitors in the world will battle it out
translation.ja: 世界中から集まった強者たちが― 頂点を目指して競います

translation.en: to be the best of the best.
translation.ja: 頂点を目指して競います

translation.en: None of this would have happened without you.
translation.ja: 全部 ママのおかげよ

translation.en: I'm so proud of you, Am.
I mean, look where you are.
You may have lost the use of your legs...
but it's opened up your heart.
Now, remember. It's not about winning. It's about the fact that you are here on this horse right now.
translation.ja: 大切なのは勝つことよりパワーに乗ってることよ

translation.en: Can it be a little about winning?
Ride like the wind, baby. Leave them all standing.
translation.ja: 風のように走って観客を魅せるのよ

translation.en: She's good. I'm freaking out, but...
translation.ja: 私のほうが緊張してる

translation.en: but it's the same thing we always do.
we have a Fan Favorite coming up.
translation.ja: 次はファン特別枠の選手です

translation.en: She's beaten incredible odds to get here.
translation.ja: 数々のハンデを克服した―

translation.en: She's got a heart as big as Texas, Amberley Snyder.
translation.ja: テキサスのように寛大なアンバリー･スナイダー！
パワー　一緒に行こう

translation.en: [Amberley] Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
translation.ja: 心の持ち方で人生は大きく変わる

translation.en: I realize maybe I won't have control over every situation in my life.
translation.ja: 気付いたの 人生を思いどおりに生きることは難しい

translation.en: Maybe I don't get to make every decision.
translation.ja: 自分では選べない道もある

translation.en: But when I wake up in the morning, I get to decide my attitude.
translation.ja: でも いつだって心の持ち方は自分で選べる

translation.en: [Amberley] And if that's the only decision I get to make that day...
translation.ja: 心の持ち方だけは選べるのなら…

translation.en: I better make it a good one.
Because with the right attitude, who knows what you can achieve?
translation.ja: だって前向きでいれば可能性は無限大よ
見事な走りでした記録は15.369秒です

translation.en: I can't believe what we just watched. I mean, that was amazing.
translation.ja: 何が起きたのでしょう信じられません

translation.en: That puts Amberley Snyder up on the board with some of the very best in rodeo.
translation.ja: 最高レベルの選手にも引けを取らない記録です

translation.en: [Amberley] When the doctors asked what my goals were,
translation.ja: 目標を聞かれて私は こう答えた
目標を聞かれて私は こう答えた 歩く 乗る ロデオ

translation.en: [female announcer] ...around the second barrel. It's just perfect.
and she's gonna be amongst them with a 15.369.
I'm telling you what. She played at a pro level here, girls.
translation.ja: これはプロでも通用します

translation.en: [female announcer] Getting a standing ovation here at AT&T Stadium.
translation.ja: 観客が総立ちで拍手を送っています

translation.en: ♪ Ain't life crazy ? ♪ ♪ I live it like a good ride ♪
translation.ja: 全米各地を回り講演活動も行っている

translation.en: ♪ I saddle up with it and smile at the sun ♪
translation.ja: 全米各地を回り講演活動も行っている 自身のスタントとして本作にも出演

translation.en: ♪ Let my wild dreams run ♪ ♪ My heart knows it's going the distance ♪
translation.ja: 自身のスタントとして本作にも出演
妹のオータムも共に出演した
妹のオータムも共に出演した そしてパワー本人も出演している

translation.en: ♪ And I ride ♪ ♪ Take the world by the reins ♪
translation.ja: そしてパワー本人も出演している
